experience.details.cra.title: Canada Revenue Agency
experience.details.cra.header.about.desc: involves developing, testing, and maintaining IT applications while proactively identifying and resolving issues to ensure seamless performance and reliability.
experience.details.cra.body.about.brief: I manage multiple applications in both production and development, some of which adopt new technologies and frameworks, requiring me to develop updated versions. My role covers the full development cycle, from frontend and backend development to analyzing business requirements and documenting processes.
Develop, test, and maintain IT applications
Create clear and concise technical documentation
Analyze and translate client requirements into actionable development plans
Handling the entire process from design and coding
to implementation for fully functional web applications.

I have gained extensive experience in full-stack web development, working on both frontend and backend across various projects. My work ranges from simple applications like form submissions to complex systems involving secure session management and file-based CRUD operations. These experiences have sharpened my ability to create efficient, scalable, and secure web applications that meet diverse business requirements.
experience.details.cra.frontend.descript: Building responsive, interactive, and user-friendly web applications with modern technologies
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.resp: Ensure a seamless and consistent user experience across various screen sizes and devices.
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.inte: Implement multilingual support to enhance accessibility and user experience across different regions.
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.arch: Build scalable and maintainable UIs using reusable and modular components.
experience.details.cra.frontend.key.inte: Efficiently manage application state and seamlessly connect with backend services for real-time data updates.
experience.details.cra.library.key.compo: Developed modular and reusable UI components used across multiple Angular applications, significantly improving consistency and maintainability.
experience.details.cra.library.key.impro: Streamlined frontend workflows by enabling rapid integration of pre-built components, reducing development time by up to six times..
experience.details.cra.library.key.acces: Ensured all components comply with WCAG 2.1 standards, delivering inclusive user experiences for people of all abilities.
experience.details.cra.library.key.secur: Implemented secure coding practices in component design to protect applications from common vulnerabilities.
experience.details.cra.backend.descripti: Designing and implementing scalable, secure, and maintainable backend systems using Java and related technologies to ensure reliable business logic and smooth data operations.
experience.details.cra.api.title: API Design & Integration
experience.details.cra.api.description: Designed and developed RESTful APIs to enable efficient communication between frontend applications and backend services, ensuring seamless data exchange and performance.
experience.details.cra.message.title: Message Queue Integration
experience.details.cra.message.descripti: Integrated asynchronous messaging to enable reliable communication between services, enhancing scalability and reducing system coupling.
experience.details.cra.auth.title: Auth & Security
experience.details.cra.auth.description: Implemented secure user authentication, role-based access control, and endpoint validation to protect sensitive data and enforce proper access controls across the application.
experience.details.cra.error.title: Error Handling & Logging
experience.details.cra.error.description: Implemented structured error handling and comprehensive logging strategies to improve system observability, maintainability, and simplify debugging.
experience.details.cra.file.title: File System CRUD Operations
experience.details.cra.file.description: Built backend features to handle file uploads, downloads, updates, and deletions, managing file storage securely and efficiently within the application.
Ensuring long-term stability, performance, and support
for both in-development and production applications

I actively maintain and support multiple applications throughout their lifecycle—from development to production. This includes updating and refactoring shared libraries, fixing production issues, and responding to client feedback. I work closely with teams to ensure smooth deployments, monitor application health, and apply best practices to keep systems running reliably and securely.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.d: Ensuring long-term stability, performance, and support for both in-development and production applications.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.s: Resolved real-time issues in production environments to minimize downtime and maintain a smooth user experience.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.u: Maintained and improved core libraries used across applications, ensuring consistency, performance, and long-term maintainability.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.b: Reduced technical debt by identifying bugs and refactoring code across multiple applications to enhance code quality and reliability.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.m: Monitored application health and optimized performance to ensure systems run efficiently under real-world usage.
experience.details.cra.maintenance.key.c: Coordinated with teams and delivered clear documentation to support smooth collaboration and ongoing system maintenance.
